resources.string: Aamchi Mumbai
Cafe Holiday

Cafe Holiday, designed by Minnie Bhatt, offers a Santorini-inspired atmosphere with hues of blue, white, and natural materials like wood, jute, and cotton rope. The cafe features a relaxed outdoor space with swings, an arched entrance, and a terracotta-black tile floor. Indoors, minimalistic decor complements a menu ranging from continental to Asian cuisine and desserts.
7/11, Meera Apts, Juhu Versova Link Rd, opp. Versova Social, Seven Bunglow, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400053
Gulshan-e-Iran

Gulshan-E-Iran is a well-known restaurant specializing in Mughlai cuisine with a unique Iranian influence. Famous for its affordable yet flavorful dishes, the must-try is Dabba Ghost, a tender mutton dish in a rich gravy. It’s a popular spot for delicious, hearty meals, ideal for budget-conscious diners near Crawford Market.
Address: 15, MRA Marg, Musafir Khana Road, Crawford Market, Mumbai CST Area.
Usmaniya Hotel

Located near Mohammed Ali Road, this Mughlai gem serves flavorful dishes like paya and kheema ghotala. It’s a favorite among those seeking authentic, budget-friendly Mughlai food with rich gravies and tender meats. The modest setting makes it ideal for casual dining.
9 D, Madina Building, SS Musafirkhana Road, Mumbai CST Area..
Cafe Metro

Situated near Metro Cinema, this cozy spot is perfect for enjoying delectable kebabs and falooda shakes. While the interiors are basic, the food quality shines, offering a relaxed dining experience in the busy Marine Lines area. The upstairs seating is a respite from Mumbai’s heat.
5/A, Jehangir Mansion, 1st Marine Street, Marine Lines.
Juhu Beach

Juhu Beach is one of the most popular beaches in Mumbai, known for its vibrant atmosphere, delicious street food, and stunning sunsets. It\'s a great place to relax, people-watch, and enjoy the beachfront views.
Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400049, India
Chowpatty Beach

Chowpatty Beach is another iconic beach in Mumbai, famous for its bustling atmosphere, delicious street food, and stunning views of the Arabian Sea. It\'s a popular spot for locals and tourists alike.
Girgaon Chowpatty, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400007, India
Aksa Beach
Aksa Beach is a quieter and more secluded beach compared to Juhu and Chowpatty. It offers a peaceful atmosphere and is ideal for those seeking a tranquil escape from the city\'s hustle and bustle.
Aksa Beach Road, Malad West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400064, India
Versova Beach

Versova Beach is known for its beautiful sunsets and is a popular spot for water sports like surfing and windsurfing. It\'s also home to the annual Ganesh Chaturthi celebrations, where thousands of people gather to immerse the idols of Lord Ganesha into the sea.
Versova Beach Road, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400061, India
Colaba Causeway

Colaba Causeway is a bustling shopping street known for its wide variety of shops selling everything from clothes and accessories to souvenirs and street food. It\'s a great place to haggle for bargains and experience the vibrant atmosphere of Mumbai's street markets.
Colaba Causeway, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India
Linking Road

Linking Road is a popular shopping destination in Mumbai, offering a wide range of clothing, accessories, and home decor items. It\'s known for its trendy boutiques, high-street brands, and vibrant street markets.
Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400050, India
Crawford Market

Crawford Market is a historic market known for its diverse range of products, including fruits, vegetables, spices, textiles, and household items. It\'s a great place to experience the local culture and find unique items.
Crawford Market, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India
Phoenix Marketcity

Phoenix Marketcity is a modern shopping mall offering a wide range of international and Indian brands, including fashion, electronics, home decor, and entertainment options. It\'s a great place for a leisurely shopping experience with a variety of dining and entertainment options.
Phoenix Marketcity, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400052, India
Marine Drive

Marine Drive, also known as the Queen\'s Necklace, is a popular promenade along the Arabian Sea. It offers stunning views of the cityscape and is a great place for evening walks, jogging, and cycling. It\'s a popular spot for couples and families to enjoy the sea breeze and relax.
Marine Drive, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India
Asiatic Library

The Asiatic Library is a renowned research institution and library with a vast collection of books, manuscripts, and historical artifacts. It\'s a great place for history buffs and scholars to explore the rich cultural heritage of India and the world.
Asiatic Society of Mumbai, Fort, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India
Flora fountain
Popular Book Store: Located near Flora Fountain, Popular Book Store is a well-known chain with a wide range of books, magazines, and stationery.
Veer Nariman Road, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Kala Ghoda, Fort, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001
